name: TRANSPLANT_INFO
description: This table contains information regarding the transplant episode. Only episodes whose Episode Type Class (I HBD 130) is 4 - Transplant will be included.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record.

columns.name: TX_REV_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient's information was presented at a multi-disciplinary committee meeting to determine whether to list the patient for transplant.

columns.name: TX_EPSD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is a donor or a recipient for the transplant.

columns.name: TX_NUM
columns.description: Stores the transplant number

columns.name: TX_HIST_LOCATION
columns.description: This item stores the location where a historic transplant occurred

columns.name: TX_SURG_DT
columns.description: Date on which the transplant surgery took place.

columns.name: TX_IS_HISTORIC_YN
columns.description: flag indicating a historic transplant episode

columns.name: TX_EPSD_NOTE_HNO_ID
columns.description: The transplant episode note record ID.

columns.name: TX_HIST_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the county where a historic transplant occurred

columns.name: TX_WAITLIST_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient was placed on the waitlist

columns.name: TX_DNR_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the possibilities being investigated to find a live transplant donor. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).

columns.name: TX_DISCHARGE_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient was discharged after the transplant surgery.

columns.name: TX_CURRENT_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: Phase of the transplant episode.

columns.name: TX_CURRENT_STAGE_DT
columns.description: Effective date for the current phase, status, and reason of the transplant episode.

columns.name: TX_CURRENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status of the current phase of the transplant episode.

columns.name: TX_CURRENT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Reason for the transplant episode's current phase and status.
entries: Candidate for Living Donor Transplant Only
Candidate Requires Multi-Organ Transplant Only, Isolated Offers Not Accepted
Candidate Condition Improved, Transplant Not Needed
Candidate Condition Deteriorated, too Sick for Transplant
Candidate Listed for Unacceptable Antigens Only

columns.name: TXP_EXTERNAL_CITY
columns.description: City where the external transplant procedure was performed.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient was admitted for the transplant procedure.

columns.name: BW_UNACCEPT_AG_C_NAME
columns.description: List the patient's BW unacceptable antigen

columns.name: TXP_NEXT_REVIEW_DT
columns.description: Date on which the transplant episode and the patient chart should be reviewed.

columns.name: TXP_ADMIT_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) for the hospital admission when the transplant surgery was performed.

columns.name: IN_TPN_DEPENDENT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is dependent on total parenteral nutrition (TPN).

columns.name: IN_IV_DEPENDENT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is dependent on intravenous fluids.

columns.name: IN_ORAL_FEEDING_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is receiving oral nutrition.

columns.name: IN_TUBE_FEEDING_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is receiving nutrition through a gastric tube.

columns.name: LISTED_ELSEWHERE
columns.description: Non-United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) center where the patient is listed.

columns.name: TIME_TO_CENTER
columns.description: The patient's travel time in hours to the transplant center.

columns.name: EXHAUST_VASC_HEM_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has exhausted vascular access for hemodialysis.

columns.name: EXHAUST_PERITON_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has exhausted peritoneal access.

columns.name: EXHAUST_IN_VASC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has exhausted vascular access to the intestine.

columns.name: LOSS_VASC_SITES_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has lost two or more vascular access sites for the intestine.

columns.name: FLUID_ELEC_LOSS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has unmanageable fluid-electrolyte losses.

columns.name: NONRECON_GITRACT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has a non-reconstructable GI tract.

columns.name: TXP_REFERRAL_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient was referred to transplant-related specialty care.

columns.name: TX_HIST_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number of the facility where the historic transplant took place.

columns.name: TX_HIST_FAX
columns.description: Fax for the facility where the historic transplant took place.

columns.name: TX_HIST_COORD
columns.description: The coordinator for the historic transplant.

columns.name: TX_HIST_CENTER_C_NAME
columns.description: United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) center where the historical transplant occurred.

columns.name: TX_EVAL_DT
columns.description: Date on which transplant evaluation began for the patient.

columns.name: TX_DNR_WILLING_YN
columns.description: Is the organ donor willing to donate organ to anyone?

columns.name: TXP_CALC_RFL_DATE
columns.description: Computed referral date for a transplant episode.  The following fields are checked, in this order, to obtain the referral date: 1. Transplant Referral Date (I HSB 30113). 2. From the transplant status history, the first time the episode reached the Pre-Evaluation phase in the system (I HSB 30056). 3. From the transplant status history, the first time the episode reached the Evaluation phase in the system (I HSB 30056). 4. Episode Start Date (I HSB 70).

columns.name: TXP_CALC_EVAL_DATE
columns.description: Computed evaluation date for a transplant episode.  The following fields are checked, in this order, to obtain the evaluation date: 1. Transplant Evaluation Date (I HSB 30007). 2. From the transplant status history, the first time the episode reached the Evaluation phase in the system (I HSB 30056).

columns.name: TXP_CALC_CR_DATE
columns.description: Computed committee review date for a transplant episode.  The following fields are checked, in this order, to obtain the committee review date: 1. Transplant Committee Review Date (I HSB 30025). 2. The earliest review date from Committee Review encounters linked to the episode (I EPT 98025).

columns.name: TXP_CALC_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: Computed admission date for a transplant episode.  The following fields are checked, in this order, to obtain the admission date: 1. Transplant Admission Date (I HSB 30048). 2. The admission date from the encounter linked to the episode as the admission encounter (I EPT 18850), as stored in item TX ADMISSION CONTACT SERIAL NUMBER (I HSB 30185).

columns.name: TXP_CALC_DISCHRG_DT
columns.description: Computed discharge date for a transplant episode.  The following fields are checked, in this order, to obtain the discharge date: 1. Transplant Discharge Date (I HSB 30006). 2. The discharge date from the encounter linked to the episode as the admission encounter (I EPT 18855), as stored in item TX ADMISSION CONTACT SERIAL NUMBER (I HSB 30185).

columns.name: TXPORT_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description: The method of transportation to the transplant center.

columns.name: UNOS_ACCEPT
columns.description: The United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) waitlist acceptance code.

columns.name: DONOR_MIN_WT
columns.description: The minimum acceptable donor weight.

columns.name: DONOR_MAX_WT
columns.description: The maximum acceptable donor weight

columns.name: TX_CENTER_WL_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient was added to the center waitlist.

columns.name: EPISODE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the episode. Use this column to filter deleted episodes by using "<>3" comparison.

columns.name: TXP_REF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The referring provider specified in the transplant care team.

columns.name: TXP_SURGEON_ID
columns.description: The surgeon specified in the transplant care team. If surgeon is not specified in the care team, it will be looked up from the associated surgical log.

columns.name: TXP_CALC_EVAL_END_DT
columns.description: Computed evaluation end date for a transplant episode.  The following fields are checked, in this order, to obtain the evaluation date: 1. Transplant Evaluation End Date (I HSB 30081). 2. If the episode is declined for transplant, use the status date 3. if the patient is waitlisted or above, use the center waitlist date(I HSB 30074), if empty, use waitlist date(I HSB 30061)  4. if patient died during referral/evaluation then return patient death date(I EPT 115)

columns.name: UNOS_LIVER_SCORE
columns.description: The most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) liver score.

columns.name: UNOS_LIVER_SCORE_DT
columns.description: The date of the most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) liver score update.

columns.name: UNOS_LIVER_IS_PELD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) liver score is a PELD score

columns.name: UNOS_LIVER_IS_STATUS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) liver score is a liver status.

columns.name: UNOS_HEART_STATUS
columns.description: The most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) heart status.

columns.name: UNOS_HEART_STATUS_DT
columns.description: The date of the most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) heart status.

columns.name: UNOS_LAS
columns.description: The most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) lung allocation score.

columns.name: UNOS_LAS_DT
columns.description: The date of the most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) lung allocation score.

columns.name: UNOS_CPRA
columns.description: The most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) Calculated Panel Reactive Antibodies (CPRA) score.

columns.name: UNOS_CPRA_DT
columns.description: The most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) Calculated Panel Reactive Antibodies (CPRA) score update date.

columns.name: TXP_EVAL_END_DT
columns.description: Date on which the transplant evaluation was completed for the patient.

columns.name: UNOS_IN_STATUS
columns.description: The most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) intestine status.

columns.name: UNOS_IN_STATUS_DT
columns.description: The date of the most recent United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) intestine status.

columns.name: TXP_CENTER_C_NAME
columns.description: The transplant center that owns the patient episode.

columns.name: TXP_SURG_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the earliest clamp time from organs associated with the transplant episode. If there are no clamp times for any associated organs, this will be null.

columns.name: HEIGHT_AT_TXP
columns.description: The donor or recipient's height at transplant, in cm.

columns.name: WEIGHT_AT_TXP
columns.description: The donor or recipient's weight at transplant, in kg.

columns.name: TOBACCO_USE_AT_TXP_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor or recipient's tobacco usage at transplant.

columns.name: ALCOHOL_USE_AT_TXP_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor or recipient's alcohol usage at transplant.

columns.name: DRUG_USE_AT_TXP_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor or recipient's drug use at transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_CAS
columns.description: Most recent lung composite allocation score

columns.name: UNOS_CAS_DATE
columns.description: The date of the most recent CAS subscore.
